title: Kaeru no Pickles: Kimochi no Iro
alternative_title: Pickles the Frog, かえるのピクルス -きもちのいろ-
description: Nakajima Corporation's "Pickles the Frog" character has spawned stuffed toys, picture books, and various other merchandise. The character's fictional biography has him born in "qua mei dou" (a play on Tokyo's Kameido neighborhood) in France on June 1, 1994.
